list.title: Software Engineer
list.summary: Worked directly with OEM and ODM to bring up sensor drivers and algorithms on Android and WearOS devices. Cooperated with international team of engineers supporting OEM and ODM to bring up sensor features on wearable devices, VR headsets and the other IOT projects.

list.title: Software Engineer
list.summary: Implemented user-space file system functions on Linux platform via C. Implemented VoIP voice call recording service for more than 1000 concurrent calls via C and Python. Integrated PBX/VoIP voice call recording and SQL service via Python. Assisted creating dogfood call plan for start-up company

list.title: Software Engineer
list.summary: Invented MTC grouping protocols for 3GPP standard and granted two US/EU patents. Designed and implemented a PBX/IP Call service via C, Android and Java languages. Built a software development environment by Git, JIRA and Jenkins for a five-people team. Implemented LTE/UMTS/GPRS/GSM communication functions on smart-phone products. Collaborated with QA team and PM team to solve bugs reported by certification labs or customers.

list.title: Research Assistant
list.summary: Worked with postdoctoral researchers and contributed to advanced telecommunication project

list.title: Research Assistant
list.summary: Contributed to antional found research project and research paper. I also gained valuable experience and mentorship from other professors and researchers, and familiarized myself with communication patent/standard methodologies.
